Context:
The School of Work and College Preparation at George Brown College is a department that collaborates with industry leaders to develop program and course content. Faculty members at the college are active in their industries, bringing real-world experience into the academic environment. The college hires respected teachers who provide excellent instruction and offer industry mentorship to students.

The faculty directory can be downloaded by clicking on the link provided. More information about land acknowledgment is available for viewing. Interested individuals can sign up to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more.

George Brown College can be contacted at 416-415-2000 or via TTY at 1-877-515-5559. The email address for inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college's social media hub can be visited through the provided link.

It is important to note that the information on this website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
